purpose.text: We hereby irrevocably undertake to refund to you without delay upon receipt of your first written demand and upon receipt of document(s) specified in field “Document and Presentation Instructions” any sum or sums not exceeding in the aggregate the Undertaking Amount.

additionalInformation.text: Supply Contract No.ABC123, Dated: 01.01.2021, signed on 15.01.2021, for the supply different pumps sets at a Contract Price of FOB EURO 2.200.000,00 and we are informed that the Supply Contract provides for an advance payment in the amount of EURO 440.000,00, which will be made against advance payment guarantee.

Beneficiary’s signed statement certifying that the Applicant has failed to fulfill his contractual obligations in respectof the supply contract specified in field   “Underlying Transaction Details” and that Beneficiary is   therefore entitled to claim the sum in Beneficiary’s said written demand.

copy of BENEFICIARY'S Letter sent to APPLICANT by E-Mail or  Telefax-Message at least 14 Days prior to BENEFICIARY’s claim under this guarantee informing the APPLICANT about BENEFICIARY’s intention to send us a claim under this Guarantee.

We hereby irrevocably undertake to refund to you without delay upon receipt of your first written demand and upon receipt of document(s) specified in field “Document and Presentation Instructions” any sum or sums not exceeding in the aggregate the Undertaking Amount.  This guarantee shall become effective as soon as the advance payment, indicating as reference this guarantee, has been received by us (account No. DE99 7104 0063 0555 4000 00, S.W.I.F.T. code AVALDEFFXXX) / the APPLICANTS’S bank, free and clear, to the APPLICANT’S benefit. Any claims under this guarantee will be accepted by us only to the extent of the advance payment received. This guarantee will expire on specified Date of Expiry, unless your written demand under this guarantee as set out above has reached us at the specified place of presentation on or before the specified Date of Expiry.  This guarantee is assignable only with our consent.
